leadership.organization: American Institute of Chemical Engineers, NTU Student Chapter
description: Founded and led the official NTU student chapter, managing its operations and member development.
Organized technical workshops and networking events with professionals to build career-ready skills.
Created and ran student competitions, including a themed jeopardy and a hackathon, to promote practical learning.
Developed and delivered a workshop curriculum on core data analytics, focusing on ETL processes and model-building fundamentals to upskill the student community.

leadership.organization: NTU One Arena 2024, College of Engineering
description: Led 15-member team, developed robots use tutorials, resolved technical issues for 150+ participants.
Built Python-coded robotic maze and competition schedule, reducing event transitions by 3 minutes.
Managed a committee team of 30 members, ensuring efforts remained organized and coordinated.
Devised an alternative activities format to ensure event continuity during participant shortages.

leadership.organization: NTU Association of Malaysian Chinese Independent School Alumni (AMCISA)
description: Planned and executed interactive games and activities using JavaScript and Google Apps Script, with integrated Google Sheets formulas for real-time tracking and record-keeping.
Coordinated with different portfolios to ensure smooth procedures and seamless execution of events.
